summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Center and the Seattle Center Capital Improvement Bond Issue (Ordinance 106629), authorizing preparation of plans, specifications and estimates for and construction of certain handicapped access improvements at the Pacific Science Center and authorizing an agreement with and accepting an easement from the Pacific Science Center Foundation in connection therewith; abandoning the Environmental Monitoring Center project in the Science Center and making certain findings supporting such abandonment; making an appropriation from the Seattle Center Improvement Fund and making an appropriation allocation for the One Percent for Art Program.
